name: Hitman Poly
description:
Hitman Poly

Autumn 2022

School game project made in the span of one month with two teammates.

_____________________________________________

Game Context

You are a hitman.

Your target is hidden in the city.

He or she is well protected.

You must find a weapon, eliminate your target and flee the city.

Good luck, agent.

_____________________________________________

Credits

UI, sound, interactable objects, scene management

  • Ludwell

AI

  • Pepen

Three Cs, weapon, gameplay

  • Power Key

3D assets

  • Polygon packs

Sound

  • UI:
    • UI Selection: broumbroum, sf3-sfx-menu-back.wav,  https://freesound.org/people/broumbroum/sounds/50557/?fbclid=IwAR1ONbntrj8aGbL2i...
    • UI Validation: broumbroum, sf3-sfx-menu-validate.wav,  https://freesound.org/people/broumbroum/sounds/50565/?fbclid=IwAR1x1-Tc-LZjz-FNw...
    • Every other UI sounds were made by Ludwell using the Chiptone app: https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone
  • Ambiance: Krotos Starter Library, Micha, Puka A., Andrew Dodds
  • Other: Krotos Starter Library sound pack
